segments.text: I am kind of nervous .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nervous ? Why ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . I never went to a church before . I was not raised as a Christian , so I don't know what to do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . You don't have to do anything.All you have to do is listen . You will enjoy it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe . I know I agreed to go with you , but now I don't feel right about it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Listen , Ryan.Catholics welcome people who aren't Catholics to visit the church.You don't have to pretend to be Catholic . It's okay if you just come to listen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . We are kind and welcoming people.It is not a secret society or something like that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . But will we sing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but you don't even have to sing . If you want to sing along , you can .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know the words .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a songbook . All the words are in the songbook.Many people have to read the words .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And will I go up to the front to have the bread and wine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . That is something only true Catholics do.So if you come to the church as a visitor , you only listen to the service.But you shouldn't go up to the altar for the bread and wine.Only after someone joins the church , then they go up for the Eucharist .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Eu-char-ist ? What is that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is the special word for the ritual of the bread and wine.The Catholics call it the Eucharist .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn't sound like an English word .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's not . It's an ancient Greek word . It means gratitude .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . Well , I feel more comfortable now.Now I understand I am welcome as a visitor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course you are . I wouldn't ask you otherwise .
segments.speaker: S2
